description: Accountability & Transparency Project - improved institutional and policy environment created to support implementation of national anti corruption strategy

subproject.description:
Output 1.1: National legislation revised in view of United Nations Committee Against Corruption and priority legal reforms identified
Output 1.2: Options for institutional arrangements to steer and coordinate a national anti-corruption strategy submitted to public debate
Output 1.3: National Integrity System Monitoring - Indicators developed and base-line study conducted to allow monitoring of progress of transparency and accountability in core governance areas
Output 1.4: Strategic regional and international partnerships developed
Output 2.1: Ethics and integrity initiatives in two pilot ministries
Output 2.2: Survey on transparency and accountability in aid management
Output 2.3: UNDP internal "Integrity Initiatives"
Output 3.1: Establishment of a "Grants Facility" to build the watchdog capacity of civil society actors and the media
Output 3.2: Research: inventory and design of public complaints mechanisms; feasibility study of social audits
Output 3.3: Training modules and anti-corruption guides developed and initial training launched
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Accountability & Transparency
